content: Yes, Surf Riders Fuerteventura offers surfboard and wetsuit rentals, as well as other surfing equipment, for those who want to surf on their own in addition to taking lessons. They have a good selection of boards for all levels, from beginners to advanced surfers, and they provide wetsuits and rashguards in different sizes. The rental prices depend on the duration of the rental and the type of equipment, but they are generally quite reasonable compared to other surf shops on the island. The staff at Surf Riders Fuerteventura are also very knowledgeable about the local surf spots and conditions, so they can give you great advice on where and when to surf depending on your level and preferences.
